Title: #148 Transforming Writing Programs for Growth and Engagement
Description:
Tim Whitaker, creator of Mighty Writers in Philadelphia, talks about the techniques he uses to get kids excited about writing. Over 2,500 students in Philadelphia choose to come to write after school as part of his program. Let’s learn how to get kids excited about writing.
